mapper.select: select [id] , [site] , [machine_name] , [event_info] , [alarm_info] , [start_time] , [end_time] , [create_time] from t_wlg_molding_machine_event_data where machine_name = #{machineName} and start_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and end_time is not null order by start_time

SELECT [id] , [site] , [machine_name] , case [status_id] when 2 then 'unitcontrol_error' when 3 then 'unitcontrol_fatal_error' end as event_info , [status_value] as alarm_info , [start_time] , [end_time] , [create_time] FROM [WLGIOT].[dbo].[t_wlg_molding_machine_status_data] where machine_name = #{machineName} and start_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and end_time is not null and [status_value] = 'true' order by start_time
